name: DOOR GAME 2
description:
DOOR GAME 2

CONTROLS

UP / DOWN / LEFT / RIGHT - arrows / wasd
A (interact / jump) -  z / j / alt
B (set bombs) - x / k / control
START (menu) - enter
SELECT (activate) - shift

i made this game for my nephew eli for his 9th birthday. we make door games for each other with paper, and so here's one made of pixels instead. 

there's a contest hidden in there, if anyone is so inclined.

any issues/bugs/weirdness, please reach out here or at themoonsidian@gmail.com.

thanks for playing!
